name: raspi-board
description: Pin mapping functionality for the Raspberry Pi in Node.js

scripts.test: cross-env RASPI_IO_TEST_MODE=true istanbul cover ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js --captureExceptions && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
